description:
Learn about the various options available for retirement planning in Singapore. This includes:

  • Annuities
  • Right-Sizing To A Smaller Home
  • Cast Top-Up To Special Account (SA) Or Retirement Account (RA)
  • Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS)
  • Insurance Policies With Various Maturity
  • Fixed Deposits With Varying Maturity
  • Shares, Bonds, Unit Trusts and Others

Learn about asset classes and asset allocation.

Learn how to decide on your investment portfolio and how to invest according to your life stage.
title: Options to Build your Retirement Income
instructors: Institute for Financial Literacy, Peggy Chan
